title: Giveaway for other servers?
body:
Hey everyone, I'm having a giveaway on my Instagram but its limited to NA only due to the fact that RP cards are only redeemable in the country you get them from. Does anyone know anyway to be able to get RP for other servers? I would love to be able to make my giveaway for everyone and not just NA.
Hoping to not have to use PayPal or use an account on a different server(to avoid the overseas fees that come along with it or else I'll rarely do my giveaways) 
Thanks in advance to anyone who might have any ideas! 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: That's pretty great that you're doing an RP giveaway on your own! Since RP cards are limited to the region that they're bought in, you're probably going to have a hard time gifting out RP to other regions. Paypal is most likely going to be your best option, but check up on our [**payment method**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/203701590) for some other possible methods.
